short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disable chrome translate for Source Code

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Disable chrome translate for Source Code (for developers).
Add 'notranslate' class to 'pre' and 'code' selector to prevent the source code from being automatically translated.

Icons made by Kiranshastry
